between individuals, providers, relying parties, and other stakeholders. Our Engine and Family Tools deliver the
following:
Reliability: k-ID applies a compliance conﬁguration to an end user via the Engine. This ensures that the result from the
age assurance provider is not simply a pass / fail, or an age or age range, but rather the actual information that the
relying party needs in order to make an age-related eligibility decision and/or to adjust the experience of the user

link to the age assurance provider. The Engine is conﬁgured by the relying party, is subject to monthly regulatory
compliance updates, and is updated for the user every time a new session is pulled from the API (ensuring that the
latest policy engine is applied to the user). Similarly, the same approach is applied to the Family Tools, to ensure that
permissions modiﬁed by a trusted adult are delivered through the Engine each time a session commences.
Fairness: Our Engine and Family Tools are entirely end user agnostic. The Engine is aligned to the legal compliance
requirements in each jurisdiction and are modiﬁed by the relying party. The Family Tools support multiple languages.
Our Engine supports multiple age veriﬁcation and assurance methods (e.g., facial age estimation, ID checks, credit
card veriﬁcation), to facilitate greater access for end users to appropriate veriﬁcation.
